title: Symbolic Music Generation with Variational Autoencoders
description: This project develops deep learning frameworks to generate symbolic music in both conditioned and unconditioned modes. Trained on thousands of copyright-free MIDI files, the goal is to develop structurally sound and audibly appealing piano compositions.

title: Defeating Dengue: A Colombia Health Map
description: This project showcases an interactive map of Colombia's municipalities in order to dicover trends and correlations related to a rising spread of dengue fever.

title: Massachusetts Bicycle Traffic Visualizer
description: An interactive site that visualizes bicycle traffic in the Greater Boston area.

title: Predicting Points Per Game (PPG) Using NBA Performance Metrics
description: This project focuses on developing a supervised learning model designed to predict the Points Per Game (PPG) statistic in the NBA based on a range of other tracked performance metrics.

title: Sentiment Analysis of User-generated Reviews.
description: Through the use of a bag-of-words approach, this system transforms textual data into a structured format that captures the frequency and presence of keywords, enabling it to quantify the overall sentiment expressed in the reviews.

title: Data Farms and 'Seaforestation'
description: An academic paper discussing climate solutions for energy efficient data centers.

title: A Predictive Analysis of U.S. Power Outage Severity
description: This project aims to reveal patterns, trends, and the limitations of this dataset as well as produce a predictive model to determine if the duration of a power outage can be classified as 'severe'.

title: Examining the Relationship Between Extreme Weather and Power Outages
description: This project analyzes the relationship between the cases of extreme weather, the areas affected in the event, and how frequent these occurrences are.

title: The US Invasion of Panama
description: An academic paper discussing the aftermath of the US invasion of Panama in 1989.
